name: Warlordocracy: Demo
description:
Warlordocracy is an upcoming RPG/RTS by Laughing Coyote Software. Currently, the game is in pre-alpha, and it consists of a randomly generated map with a few baddies and a couple quests. It should be challenging, though.

A 2nd demo should be along in a few months with more substance.

For more games by Laughing Coyote Software, go here: https://blancaster45.itch.io/
